snippet: The leader of Germany's Turkish community on Monday accused President Tayyip Erdogan of damaging ties between the two NATO allies by likening bans on political rallies by Turks in Germany  to "fascist actions" reminiscent of Nazi times....

headline.main: Germany's Turkish Community Say Erdogan Went Too Far With Nazi Comments
headline.print_headline: Germany's Turkish Community Say Erdogan Went Too Far With Nazi Comments

lead_paragraph: The leader of Germany's Turkish community on Monday accused President Tayyip Erdogan of damaging ties between the two NATO allies by likening bans on political rallies by Turks in Germany  to "fascist actions" reminiscent of Nazi times.
